select tl.id, tl.operate_model as operateModel, tl.message as message, su.username as username, su.full_name as fullName, tl.operate_type as operateType, date_format(tl.operate_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as operateDate from tools_log tl left join system_user su on tl.admin_id = su.id and tl.operate_type='0' where 1=1
and tl.operate_date >= str_to_date(#{start},'%Y-%m-%d')
and tl.operate_date <= date_add(str_to_date(#{end},'%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL 1 day)
and su.username like CONCAT('%',#{username},'%')
and tl.operate_model = #{optType}
order by tl.operate_date desc
